directions: Mix 1 1/2 cups water, cornmeal and salt in heavy medium saucepan. Cook over medium-low heat until mixture thickens, stirring frequently, about 8 minutes. Mix in ginger. Gradually add milk and stir until mixture comes to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook until cereal is thick and smooth, stirring frequently, about 8 minutes.
Remove saucepan from heat. Stir in molasses and brown sugar. Cover saucepan and let stand 15 minutes.
Spoon cereal into bowls and serve
title: Cornmeal Mush with Molasses and Ginger
